bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of nüe ji 瘧疾 , malaria ailment, differently affecting the foot yin and yang conduits. Su wen 素問 36 lists different malaria conditions such as zu tai yang zhi nüe 足太陽之瘧 , foot major yang malaria; zu shao yang zhi nüe 足少陽之瘧 , foot minor yang malaria; zu yang ming zhi nüe 足陽明之瘧 , foot yang brilliance malaria; zu tai yin zhi nüe 足太陰之瘧 , foot major yin malaria; zu shao yin zhi nüe 足少陰之瘧 , foot minor yin malaria; zu jüe yin zhi nüe 足厥陰之瘧 , foot ceasing yin malaria. Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 12: 素問論六經瘧 , “The Su wen discusses six types of conduit-specific malaria ”.
